module.name: ContentBlocks
module.description: The content blocks module provides the possibility to re-use content on multiple pages. The content can be managed in one place and changes will affect all pages where the content block is used. Some examples for these content blocks are: footer doormats, addresses, social media blocks, call to actions, ...

events.event: Thrown when a content block is created.
Thrown when a content block is changed.
Thrown when a content block is deleted.
